creator: Troutman, Stanley
title: Hiroshima - two years after Two years ago, on August 6, 1945, the first atomic bomb used in warfare was dropped on Hiroshima. The city is being rebuilt slowly - approximately fifty per cent of the city has risen from the ruins - and some evidences of the terrific blast that shook the 343,000 population have been removed. But the day will probably never dawn when the people of the city will forget; the rest of the world may forget, but not the people of Hiroshima /
